Question.Subject: How do I password private my tumblr?
Question.Content: ok so i have a tumblr account. i want to private my tumblr now because i don't want people to see it. how do i do so? i know i can create a new blog under the tumblr im using now, but i don't want that. i want people to be required to type a password to view my tumblr. how do i do that?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
http://techie-buzz.com/social-networking/tumblr-introduces-password-protected-blogs.html
^-^ i'm pretty sure it's in there somewhere. follow for follow? georgeclooney.tumblr.com

Answer.Content:
http://techie-buzz.com/social-networking/tumblr-introduces-password-protected-blogs.html
